problem_text_cn: 如图,一个斜坡长130m,坡顶离水平地面的距离为50m,那么这个斜坡与水平地面夹角的正切值等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the length of a slope is N_0, and the distance between the top of the slope and the horizontal ground is N_1, then the tangent of the angle between the slope and the horizontal ground is equal to ()
raw_comment: 本题考查解直角三角形的应用、勾股定理的应用等知识,解题的关键是记住锐角三角函数的定义,属于基础题．
